title: Altcoins Consolidating Their Strength by Joining Bitcoin
description: Market Picture Market capitalisation has fallen 2% in the last 24 hours to $3.30 trillion. Bitcoin, stuck near past highs, quickly spoiled the market’s mood, triggering a local profit correction after the rally. An active correction in gold may also be playing a role.
